name: Herman's Fallacy
description:
Welcome to our LD49 submission for the Unstable theme!

Herman's got a crush and a life long dream. Watch him embark on his journey to eternal happiness, facing his internal demons along the way.

Controls:

  • W - Move forward
  • S - Move backwards
  • A - Lean/turn left
  • D - lean/turn right
  • E - moves up in zero gravity
  • Q - moves down in zero gravity
  • R - restart from last checkpoint
  • Mouse - move camera

NOTE: A couple hours after submission time we were able to fix our framerate and collisions bugs when Unity built the project. Please find original and fixed zips below.
